## MACD interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MACD 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [div](./transducers-stats.macd.div.md) | <code>number</code> | Divergence (histogram), i.e. <code>macd - signal</code> |
|  [fast](./transducers-stats.macd.fast.md) | <code>number</code> | Fast EMA value |
|  [macd](./transducers-stats.macd.macd.md) | <code>number</code> | Main MACD value: <code>ema(fast) - ema(slow)</code> |
|  [signal](./transducers-stats.macd.signal.md) | <code>number</code> | Smoothed MACD, i.e. EMA(smooth) of <code>macd</code> value |
|  [slow](./transducers-stats.macd.slow.md) | <code>number</code> | Slow EMA value |
